text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovMurphy Dear Sir,

Thank you for the $ millions send to 🇿🇦 in aid by 🇺🇸

Our courts have now ruled that #covid19 aid will be distributed by RACE and not NEED.

Thank you for your contribution to racism.

👍 Sure you meant well.

https://t.co/G6YBD6CWEC
